description.value: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element. You might be a criminal yourself, or you might have gained an understanding of how they operate from the outside. You become trained in Underworld Lore, and you gain your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} circumstance bonus to Thievery checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EwgTZBWsc8qKaViP]{Investigate} the subject of your lead (such as checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} a clue from a suspect or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick a Lock} to open a safe with damning documents).
